quiz.question: What is the primary focus of staff development?

options.b: Enhancing both professional and personal growth
options.c: Training employees for their current role only

quiz.question: Which of the following is NOT a method of staff development?
According to Flippo, staff development focuses on preparing employees for:

options.b: Future managerial tasks of increasing difficulty

quiz.question: What is the first step in the staff development process?
Which of the following best describes 'Job Enrichment'?

options.a: Increasing the number of tasks an employee performs
options.b: Providing more autonomy and decision-making opportunities in a job

quiz.question: What is the main advantage of 360-degree feedback?

options.a: It provides feedback from one source
options.b: It helps identify strengths and areas for development
options.c: It is only useful for senior management

quiz.question: What is a key challenge of Off-the-Job Training?

options.b: It may not be directly applicable to the employee's job immediately after training
options.c: It is not effective for long-term growth

quiz.question: Which method involves employees working on real-time problems or projects?
What is the purpose of succession planning?

options.b: To identify and prepare potential future leaders
options.c: To improve the work-life balance of employees

quiz.question: Which of the following is a benefit of On-the-Job Training (OJT)?

options.a: It requires employees to leave their job to train
options.b: It provides direct application of skills to the job
